title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-1.10 - Fair hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 373-1.10 - Fair hearings

State Regulations

To the extent not inconsistent with this Subpart, all
of the requirements in Part 358 of this Title concerning notice requirements
and fair hearings will apply to the RCA program. For the purposes of Part 358
of this Title, RCA will be considered public assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
373-1.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
